protein.specific_function: The alpha-2/delta subunit of voltage-dependent calcium channels regulates calcium current density and activation/inactivation kinetics of the calcium channel

reference.reference_text: Qin N, Yagel S, Momplaisir ML, Codd EE, D'Andrea MR: Molecular cloning and characterization of the human voltage-gated calcium channel alpha(2)delta-4 subunit. Mol Pharmacol. 2002 Sep;62(3):485-96.
